price: 70. Kaadu ummaan nafsih abbaheemih galtó kaah duudusuntah maqaanée kee umaanék, Kaadu Yalli Usuk, usun abba haanam yaaxigeh.
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahuwa aʿlamu bimā yafʿalūna
